Question
========

In repeated measures ANOVA, ‘sphericity’ is an important assumption. What does this assumption refer to? On the distribution of:
  
Answerlist
----------
* the person effect $$gamma_{2}$.
* the group effect.
* the difference scores.
* the marginal standard deviation.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
